title: Barcelona
occurrences: This is my favorite Barcelona avenue.

I don't know what it was like in other cities, but in Barcelona...
I don't know whether I had found God in Barcelona...
But she was late, which was actually not that common in Barcelona.
He's supposed to come to Barcelona this summer. I hope you can meet him.
- The coffee's strange here. - In Barcelona?

Barcelona and Chicago never seemed more beautiful than they did that fall.
In Barcelona, I had to quickly plan the wedding...
Montserrat was the same way. It's a Barcelona girl thing.
